body:
So whatever server I join, everything looks like this..
Any one know how to fix?
body_tagged:
So whatever server I join, everything looks like this..

title: Visual glitch

replies.body: Is your screen showing this for a long period of time, or only when you join a lobby / game?
replies.body_tagged: Is your screen showing this for a long period of time, or only when you join a lobby / game?

replies.body: The only thing you can do is relogging
replies.body_tagged: The only thing you can do is relogging

replies.body:
every time i move my mouse it changes back for about 0.5 of a second then goes back to it.
It happens when I am ingame too

replies.body:
Give me a second, there's a setting that does this to me, let me find it

EDIT: Try  turning on/off VBO's
replies.body_tagged:
Give me a second, there's a setting that does this to me, let me find it

replies.body:
advanced opengl off?
oh nvm
u are in 1.8
replies.body_tagged:
advanced opengl off?
oh nvm
u are in 1.8

replies.body: Happens to me a lot of times... Every time i made my RD more than 5, it'd do that. Try turning VBO on/off
replies.body_tagged: Happens to me a lot of times... Every time i made my RD more than 5, it'd do that. Try turning VBO on/off

replies.body: It's 1.8. Turn down your render distance and your fine(I have same problem with normal+ render distance)
replies.body_tagged: It's 1.8. Turn down your render distance and your fine(I have same problem with normal+ render distance)

replies.body: This looks like one of Jive's videos...
replies.body_tagged: This looks like one of Jive's videos...

replies.body:
Its it like this?
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ssF0YZARaVY
If it is I fixed it by changing my render distance.
